description: An individual block in the metadata chain that captures the history of modifications of a dataset.

fetch.description: Determines where data is sourced from.

prepare.description: Defines how raw data is prepared before reading.

read.description: Defines how data is read into structured format.

preprocess.description: Pre-processing query that shapes the data.

merge.description: Determines how newly-ingested data should be merged with existing history.
